document_data.name: Shadow Hand
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shadow hand''''' was an [[illusion]] [[spell]] that would conjure a translucent, billowy hand that obeyed the will of the caster.
document_data.Effects:
The shadowy hand had to stay within a number of yards of the caster, depending on their level. 

''Shadow hand'' was capable of providing cover, much like ''[[Bigby's interposing hand]]'', as well as capable of carrying materials, much like ''[[Tenser's floating disk]]''.

It had no effect on the [[undead]], [[golem]]s, [[construct]]s, creatures from the [[outer planes]], and primitive non-vertebrates (such as [[ooze]]s, [[slime]]s, and non-intelligent plants).
document_data.History: This spell was created by the wizard named [[Jume]] several hundred years before the [[Time of Troubles]] and recorded in her personal [[spellbook]], the [[Arcanabula of Jume]].
